content.text: Match ends, Hull City 2, Watford 0.
Second Half ends, Hull City 2, Watford 0.
Attempt blocked. M'Baye Niang (Watford) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Juan Zuñiga.
Attempt missed. Troy Deeney (Watford) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Stefano Okaka.
Substitution, Hull City. Michael Dawson replaces Kamil Grosicki.
